name: CreateFileSystemLogView
description:
Create a new file system log view for a project.

Use this tool to initiate the creation of a file system log view for a specified project. It interacts with the Datadog API to set up logging configurations.

parameters.name: target_project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project for which you want to create a file system log view. Use the API to retrieve the project ID if unknown.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: log_view_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object containing details such as id (string), path (string), depth (integer), type (string), ref (string), href (string), meta (JSON object), shortcut (boolean), created_at (string), and last_viewed_at (string) for the log view creation.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
